name: Planets Harvest Unit
description:
This game is created for ludumdare 52. 

The theme is harvest.

We are thrilled to have you as a member of our Planet Harvest Unit. Our aim is to gather minerals from all around the cosmos so that our race can prosper!  Controls:  Drag, Hold , Drop  Mission:  Harvest Minerals as much as possible and depart the planet before you get killed Who has the most harvest? ~~You~~/ Planet Harvest Org.
